message: Apparently the "events" resource only identifies a repo as the result of a fork... it doesn't include a fork event in the  original repo.
Is there a way to query how many forks there are for a repo?
For example: I know python-bitbucket has 2 forks from this page:  https://bitbucket.org/jmoiron/python-bitbucket/descendants
How can I get that from the API?
